gw.api.graph

Class ReadableGraph<T extends Object>

  • gw.api.graph.ReadableGraph<T>

  • public class ReadableGraph<T extends Object>
    Super-interface for any graph that has basic readable properties and query methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Set<Edge<Object>> Edges
      Returns a set of all edges in the graph.
      Set<Object> Nodes
      Returns a set of all nodes in the graph. AKA vertexes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<Edge<Object>> getIncomingEdges(Object node)
      Returns a set of all edges going into the given node.
      Set<Edge<Object>> getOutgoingEdges(Object node)
      Returns a set of all edges going out of the given node.

    • Field Detail

      • Edges

        Set<Edge<Object>> Edges
        Returns a set of all edges in the graph.

      • Nodes

        Set<Object> Nodes
        Returns a set of all nodes in the graph. AKA vertexes.

    • Method Detail

      • getIncomingEdges

        Set<Edge<Object>> getIncomingEdges(Object node)
        Returns a set of all edges going into the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - The target node
        Returns:
        The incoming edges

      • getOutgoingEdges

        Set<Edge<Object>> getOutgoingEdges(Object node)
        Returns a set of all edges going out of the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - The source node
        Returns:
        The outgoing edges
